oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Samuel Cantrell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This tintype of Samuel Cantrell of Warren County, Tennessee was created several years after the Civil War. Cantrell enlisted as a private in Co. C, 23rd Tenn. Inf., CSA. He was promoted to corporal in September 1863 and served the entire war. Captured at Hatchers Run on April 2, 1865, he gave his oath of allegiance on June 19, 1865 in Richmond, Virginia. See warr032 for another Cantrell image.
